messages: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
If you really want to do something, you’ll find a way. If you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.
If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
Vision without execution is just hallucination.
Don’t expect the results without the work.
Don’t say you don’t have enough time. You have exactly the same amount of hours per day that were given to Musk, Stroustrup, Leonardo Di Vinci, Edison, Newton, and Albert Einstein.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted to do. Do it now!
Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven’t planted.
You either get bitter or you get better.
Be so good they can’t ignore you.
